div.p: HEGENDORF Christophorus,: Integrae, in omnia Marci capita adnotationes recognitae. In Epistolam Pauli ad Hebraeos. In Epistolam Petri Priorem. Matthaei In Supplicium Johannis Ad Lectorem...— Haguenau, J. Secer1526, in-80. Burg, n° 203; Bibl. S. Guillaume, Strasbourg. 1970 HEGENDORF Christophorus,: Christiana studiosae Iuventutis Institutio. Explicatio locorum implicatissimorum in Colloquiis Erasmi...—( Haguenau, J. Secer1526), in-8°, Burg, n° 204. 1971 HEGENDORF Christophorus,: De instituenda vita.— Haguenau, Jean SecerJean KnoblochSecer1529, in-8°, Ritter, Grand Sém. Strasbourg n° 251. 1972 HEGENDORF Christophorus,: Quae iuvenibus eloquentia cupidis in primis scribenda sint, ex Fabio relata, et exemplis pulcherrimis illustrata. Item oratio in artium liberalium laudem coram frequenti eruditorum homi¬ num concessu, in Neacademia Posnaniensi habita.— ( Haguenau, J. Secer1531), in-80, Burg, n° 208. 1973 HEGENDORF Christophorus,: Enarrationes Novae Evangelij Sancti Marci. His conciones sex Divi Chrysostomi de providentia divina, latine facte, accessere.— Haguenau, J. Secer( juin 1533), in-8°. Burg, n° 209. 1974 HEGENDORF Christophorus,: Dialogi pueriles. A la suite de: PETRUS Mosellanus, Paedologia.—( Strasbourg, Jean SecerJean Knobloch , décembre1521)[ n° 2879). 1975 HEGENDORF Christophorus, Chr. Voir: ARISTOTELES n° 846; CICERO nos 1350, 1380; ERASMUS n° 1582; PETRUS Mosellanus n° 2879.( RITTER, Rép, nos 1101- 1109). 229 8- 1
